statements: DELETE FROM ImpactAssessment WHERE commercial_development = 'Retail' AND assessment_date < '2023-01-01'
DELETE FROM CommercialDevelopments WHERE development_name = 'Office Park';
DELETE FROM SmallBusinesses WHERE business_id = 100 AND business_name = 'ABC Company';
DELETE FROM CommercialDevelopments WHERE development_type = 'Office Building' AND development_location = 'Downtown';
DELETE FROM CommercialDevelopments WHERE development_name = 'Office Tower';
DELETE FROM AssessmentResults WHERE impact_category = 'High Risk';
